lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank will soon inform investors and shareholders about adjustments to its future strategy, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters, adding a capital increase was among possible tools the lender could use.

headline.main: Klopp Urges Inconsistent Liverpool to Get Back on Track
